CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`engincident` ( id BIGINT(20) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, openedOn DATETIME NOT NULL, openedBy_id BIGINT(20), resolvedOn DATETIME, resolvedBy_id BIGINT(20), message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, stackTrace TEXT, casefile_id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT `engincident_openedBy` FOREIGN KEY (`openedBy_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `engincident_resolvedBy` FOREIGN KEY (`resolvedBy_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `engincident_casefile` FOREIGN KEY (`casefile_id`) REFERENCES `casefile` (`id`) );
